reviews.review: Really great puzzle game, it's a shame that it's really short, so I recommend you to get Portal 2 aswell.

Great game but I found it a little short

Şu ana kadar oynadığım en iyi bulmaca oyunu . Bulmacaları ne aşırı zor ne de aşırı kolay . Almak istiyorsanız hazır Steam yaz indirimlerindeyken alın hatta Portal 2 yi bundle biçimde alın

Норм игра
Игра шедевральная. на первом уровне вам придётся задействовать мозг. Так что я даже скажу, что игра развивает.

Easily one of the best games of all time. It's mechanics may be refined by it's sequel, but the innovation that made the two best puzzle games of all time began in right here. Not many games have a great story, amazing villain and unbelievably fun and challenging gameplay, but Portal has all those and more!
《Portal》游戏的氛围做得真不错
Divertente, l'ho preso nel bundle di portal e portal 2 a praticamente 20 centesimi dato che portal 2 valeva 2 euro negli sconti
Великолепно

i'm GlaD i finally get to play this game. a bit late though, but still!

cake/10

Comment vous expliquer.
Portal et Portal 2, deux jeux mythiques, que Valve vous laisse en solde à des prix ridicules. Si c'est pas du mécénat ça !
Pour l'instant, je n'ai pas trouvé de meilleur personnage que GLaDOS dans n'importe quel jeux vidéo/film.
[code] Ma création relève du pur génie digne de mon être informatique. [/code]
Good Game Fun to play with the portals nothing else

 퍼즐게임을 좋아하게 된 계기가 된 게임

Öncelikle çok kısa bir oyun. Daha doğrusu kısaya yakın. Bir oturuşta bilemedim 2 oturuşta bitirebilceğiniz çerez oyunlardan biridir. Hatırladığım kadarıyla co-op moduda bulunmakta. Ve atölyeden map indirip oynanılıyordu. İndirirme girince alınacak oyunlardan birisidir.

I jumped on the bandwagon a bit late with this one. Nevertheless this is one of the most enjoyable experiences I've had in gaming. Quirky humour, challenging but never frustrating puzzles, interesting story, can't find a flaw really. Some might argue the game is too short, but having little time for games myself, I found it refreshing.
暈第一人称的不要想了。
容易出现智力无法接受，但是好玩啊！！
One of the best games I've ever played. Took about 3.5 hours to complete and it was totally worth it.
THE CAKE IS A LIE
晕3D的都是辣鸡！[spoiler] 呕··········	[/spoiler]
repetí un test de iq, no paso de la chamber 1

J'aime beacoup ce jeu (le faite de réfléchir, d'être précis, ect...) mais c'est beaucoup, beaucoup trop court (je l'ai fini en 1h50!!)C'est vraiment dommage j'ai du faire un remboursement, heuresement que je n'y ai pas jouer plus de 2h et encore moins que je l'achete à 10€ (je l'ai acheté pendant les soldes d'été 2017 dans le pack portal à ~2,23€). Je l'ai quand même recommandez parce qu'il est vraiment important de jouer au 1 avant de faire le 2 qui est vraiment différents et mieux !
Very unexpected ending......

Pensa num jogo que seja simples, divertido e desafiador: é a definição de Portal. Jogabilidade boa, gráficos excelentes para um jogo de 2007 e puzzles mto bem feitos. Me surpreendeu em tudo. Apesar da história curta, vale a pena a jogatina. Nota 10.
好玩便宜 岂不美哉？
JUST GET IT. I didn't think i would like this kind of a game but I loved it.
Surprisingly great story, challenging puzzles.
十分烧脑的游戏 玩久了就想吐(╯﹏╰)
Amazing game. Funny and creative and it makes you think on almost every puzzle. Wish it was a little longer though, but still awesome!

Amazing amazing game! Short, but really really fun and an interesting story to boot! I would highly recommend getting this game. Intriguing puzzles that are so satisfying to complete and comical dialog from the story's antagonist.
QUE JOGÃO DA PORRA! 10/10
Great Game

I expected more puzzles but overall good game and I recommend it for people who are looking for new experince. 

6/10 too short.
Utterly fantastic! Still one of the greatest games of all time. SO much wow!

Despues de tantos años de gaming decidi comprarme este juego. Lo compre por culto, mas que por otra cosa. La verdad me desiluciono la poca horas de juego que tiene, pero son TAN intensas que vale la pena comprarlo en periodo de ofertas cuando baja a centavos de dolar. Es una experiencia corta pero muy disfrutable. 8/10
one of my favorates, fun and challenging
给最后的歌一百个赞啊
哈哈很有意思，天花板一个门，地板一个门，无限下坠中！！！

Portal is a puzzle game involving cubes, buttons, turrets, and much more stuff. This game is a first person, puzzle, sci fi and action type game. This my favorite game. I like it more that ROBLOX. I suggest you get it if you're into games that involve some thinking. Portal, now you're thinking with portals!

Portal... que te digo. Compra el p*to juego es una obra maestra, corto pero con el mejor villano de la historia de los videojuegos. Ademas es barato asi q de que te quejas todo ventajas... El protagonista es mudo :)

this game is criminally short and from start to finish only took me 72 minutes to complete. I still not completed the challenge maps but those ar next opn my list.

Even though it is so short i still feel this game is good. Very good even.

For 0.99 i HIGHLY reccomend getting it during the summer sale. For full price, personally, would pass. But for any kind of discount this game is good.

烧脑游戏，真的很不错

玩久了头晕太严重了！！！
考虑智商的游戏，很好玩。

An oldie but a favorite, Valve comes to make us think with this game. Both portal 1 and portal 2 are fantastic games to pick up for the puzzle logic of it as well as quick movements while on the go.

This is an amazing puzzle game that keeps on going! It may be a little short, but it is super fun and great for your free time!
Great game. A little short but amazing as sweet pussssssy!!!
good game

I highly recommend this portal and the second one. good story, loads of fun. sometimes hard but not impossible!
The second story is much longer but as fun as this one.
It is awesome to see how creative developers can get!
A pesar de que primero me pase el 2, comprarme este no fue mala idea

worth every second, despite being short !!

Oyunu kesinlikle oynamalısınız zaten indirimde 1-2tl civarı oluyor. Eğlenceli ve kafa yorucu 2 saat geçirirsiniz. Tek kötü yanı 2 saat olması ama valve durmamış 2'yi yapmış. Portal 2'yle içinizde kalan yarım hissi tamamlayabilirsiniz. Bulmaca çözmeyi sevmeyen biri iseniz bile oynamanız gereken oyunlardan, zaten 2 saat bir şey kaybetmezsiniz.
Interesting puzzle.
Нет слов. 10/10
Simplemente diré que acabé el juego con los pelos de punta.
Picked up this game for 99 cents during the summer sale. Best. 99. Cents. Ever. Spent. It is a short game but it is 2 hours of great puzzles and the best ending I have ever whitnessed.

10/10

Très bon jeu, rapide mais remplie de satisfaction !

I really liked it. The game was fairly easy, not sure about the bonus maps though cause I didn't try them. Definitely a buy if you enjoy puzzle games and worth the $1 price tag that appears whenever there's a Steam Sale, though I recommend you buy the bundle with Portal 2 or the Valve Collection for $17.
Jogo inovador e inoxidavél. Em todos os pontos, perfeito

9.5/10
精妙的构思，简直是巧夺天工。

Gracz którego pierwszą grą z serii portal była by ta gra niewiedziałby o co chodzi. Sama gra jest nawet ładna, praktycznie nie ma bugów, poziomy nie są zbyt trudne, lecz nad niektórymi trzeba troszkę posiedzieć. Jakoże ja gram w tą cześć jako ostatnią (Portal 2 i stories mel już przeszedłem) fabuła mnie zafascynowała - fantastycznie uzupełnia brakującą całość. Gra jest warta swojej ceny mimo strasznie któtkiego gameplay'u.
stright 5/7 game. Short game but very entertaining.
un classico

Oh Valve, what an amazing game you made! I really liked the story, the characters and the logic parts in it!! :-D I had SO much fun and couldn't get enought of it.
I would almost go so far to say that it is a must Have for every Gamer out there!

A pesar de ser corto tiene una historia buena y entretenida , los puzzles son desafiantes y divertidos 10/10 .

Wonderful game, it's already a classic (and deserves to be) :D
If you haven't yet played this game, just do it!

Cheap (as of summer sale it's 1$) not easy and not hard.
Very fun, awesome idea and i am looking forward to buy Portal 2.

Not the longest game, but it's well made, funny, and teh puzzles are satisfying.

这款游戏在打折的时候入手，听说创意不错，故而开始玩一玩。

结果，没想到。。对于有3D眩晕的我造成了成吨的暴击。。。。每次平均1个小时就是极限。。

全程：我在哪？怎么可以这样？啊，晕死了。。

总之，游戏是一个好游戏，创意很好。已经购买了传送门2.。。。以后又想头晕的话再玩吧。。。

我是先通的第二部，所以打通第一部后并没有感到惊艳。
本作和续作比起来剧情上差一些，光圈机器人也没有像第二部中那样让我觉得很可爱。
但是还是不错的。
gud puzzles. gud game.
Sehr gut!

Nice game!
就是前面关卡有点短。。。

Brilliant game. Bought it at 90% discount and it took me almost 4 hours to complete it. I enjoyed the challenge in solving puzzles and the ending song is catchy. Recommended at a cheap pirce with 90% discount.
